name: Senor Pink
text: When Attacking â‘  (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area): If your Leader has the (Donquixote Pirates) type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active at the end of this turn.

effect.text: If your Leader has the (Donquixote Pirates) type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active at the end of this turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in a box in the bottom right. The card is marked as 'SPECIAL' in the top right, but this is not a rarity and is treated as a flavor/indicator. Power value is clearly 5000. Cost is clearly 3. The card is a Character type.
